lastfm.summary: "We like to call this style of our music 'Cybermetal.' 'Zero' has six rhythm guitars, with two line-in 12-string acoustics, plus those wacky James Iha leads. Tracked live with overdubs added later, this is a true mover as well as the first song that was recorded for Mellon Collie and the infinite sadness, James has always said this reminds him of Judas Priest." -Billy Corgan (Guitar World 1/97) Read more on Last.fm.
